attributes.additional_details: The M20 was changed late 2018 to put operation Brock in place. In March when Brexit was supposed to happen the contra flow was started. When brexit didn’t happen it was stopped and the flow of traffic to Dover was returned to its proper carriageway. Operation Brock has now been implemented today even though Brexit isn’t going ahead this month. I fail to understand why this has been allowed to go ahead knowing Brexit has been delayed and it should be stopped!
attributes.background: Operation Brock has been implemented this morning even though Brexit has been delayed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

As of 30 October 2019, Operation Brock has been inactive, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/operation-brock-to-be-deactivated

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
